title: Looking for some help, and an Elberfeld
author: Howe’s Hunter

posts.post_title: Looking for some help, and an Elberfeld
posts.post_content: A board member kindly sent me his Elberfeld recently when he discovered it had Howe’s stamp on the back. Now I need to find a replacement for him. If you have an available example, please PM me with images so I can see if it would be a fair trade. Thanks. Ed
